ValidationRule.description: Requires Coordinator to reach out to the Commercial Contact if the Tax Acceptability on the Account contains "Approval Required".
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Account.Accept_s_Tax_Paid__c, "Yes - Approval Required"), OR ( ISPICKVAL( Status, "Closed"), ISPICKVAL( Status, "Closed - Approved"), ISPICKVAL( Status, "Closed - Rejected") ), Commercial_Contact_Reached__c = FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Did you reach out to the Commercial Contact to verify the product can be sold to this account?
